itunes:title: The Presence of God Week 2 with Lisa Harper
title: The Presence of God Week 2 with Lisa Harper
description:
For the second week of our Presence of God series, Raechel and Amanda talk with author, speaker, and exuberant student of God’s Word, Lisa Harper. Their lively conversation covers topics like God’s footsteps in the garden, His manifest presence in the burning bush, His glory filling the temple, and His mercy planted right in the middle. Breezing past holy bouncers and Baywatch, the three friends celebrate how God makes His presence and redemption known in unmistakable ways. No matter how far we wander, He is always near. 

Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 2 of the She Reads Truth The Presence of God reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop The Presence of God Reading Plan collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/the-presence-of-god-week-2-with-lisa-harper/
